# Github

## Get repo
```{python}
def get_repo():   
    !gh repo list > git-repo-list.txt
    with open("./git-repo-list.txt") as f:
        lines = f.readlines()
    repos = [line.split()[0] for line in lines]
    return repos

repos = get_repo()
repos.sort()
repos[:5]
repos.remove("VincentChong123/tfip_da")
```

```{python}
print(f"number of repo {len(repos)}\nrepo name {[r.split("/")[-1] for r in repos[:5]]}")
```
